descriptions.title: Six Session (Ritual)
descriptions.content:
Description

A ritual recited six times a day (three times in the morning and three times in the evening) as a way of fulfilling commitments that come with taking bodhisattva vows, tantric vows, and anuttarayoga tantric empowerments. Popular chiefly among Dge lugs pas, it is often combined with guru yoga and, less frequently, with deity yoga practice.

Example Texts

  • Thun drug gi rnal ‘byor skyong tshul ‘khyer bde
  • Mi la la brten pa'i rnal 'byor thun drug nyams len sogs
  • Thun drug dang bla ma’i rnal ‘byor
  • Dus 'khor bla ma'i rnal 'byor thun drug skyong tshul
  • Thun drug tu sdom gsum gyi bslab bya skyong tshul gyi yi ge (Expository treatise?)
  • See also TBRC T1309
